The professor and his daughter Sylvia travel to Thomson. Terrible things happen soon, beyond imagination or reality. Dead people are seen near an old, unused mine. Late people seem to live suddenly. Professor Forbes presumes that black magic is involved and someone has extraordinary power. He doesn't know how close he is: the dead become alive because of a magic voodoo-ritual, and so they must serve their master as mindless zombies...

Older children will probably get the most out of this movie.

actors: Fanny Ardant, Jeremy Irons, Joan Plowright, Jay Rodan

description: As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, their game might be a way to avoid the fact that they are truly meant for one another.

title: California Split (1974)

description: When a casual gambler (George Segal as Bill) befriends a professional one (Elliott Gould as Charlie), he begins to mirror his life, sending both deeper into the sleazy gambling world where the stakes keep getting bigger.

title: Emmanuelle (1974)
actors: Alain Cuny, Sylvia Kristel, Marika Green, Daniel Sarky
description: The wife of a French diplomat in Bangkok, Emmanuelle embarks on a voyage of sexual discovery.

title: Gone in 60 Seconds (1974)
actors: H. B. Halicki
description: With H.B. Halicki, Marion Busia, Jerry Daugirda, James McIntyre. When a South American drug lord pays Pace to steal 48 cars for him, all but one is in the bag - thereby, the police precipitate in a desperate car chase against Pace and his Eleanor across Southern California.

title: Holy Mountain, The (Montaña sagrada, La) (1973)
actors: Alejandro Jodorowsky, Horacio Salinas, Zamira Saunders, Juan Ferrara
description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

title: Twelve Tasks of Asterix, The (Les douze travaux d'Astérix) (1976)

actors: Roger Carel, Jacques Morel, Pierre Tornade, Henri Labussière

actors: Gene Hackman, Fernando Rey, Bernard Fresson, Philippe Léotard
description: "Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.

title: Irony of Fate, or Enjoy Your Bath! (Ironiya sudby, ili S legkim parom!) (1975)
actors: Andrey Myagkov, Barbara Brylska, Yuriy Yakovlev, Aleksandr Shirvindt

actors: Jack Nicholson, Maria Schneider, Jenny Runacre, Ian Hendry
description: Unable to find the war he's been asked to cover, a frustrated war correspondent takes the risky path of co-opting the identity of a dead arms-deal acquaintance.

title: Trilogy of Terror (1975)
actors: Karen Black, Robert Burton, John Karlen, George Gaynes
description: Three bizarre horror stories, all of which star Karen Black in four different roles playing four tormented women.

title: 1900 (Novecento) (1976)
actors: Robert De Niro, Gérard Depardieu, Dominique Sanda, Francesca Bertini
description: The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth-century Italy as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

title: Futureworld (1976)
actors: Peter Fonda, Blythe Danner, Arthur Hill, Yul Brynner
description: Upon uncovering the dirty secret of futuristic theme-park Futureworld, an ex-employee is killed after he tips off two other reporters who decide to do an undercover investigation.

title: Harlan County U.S.A. (1976)
actors: John L. Lewis, Carl Horn, Norman Yarborough, Logan Patterson
description: A heartbreaking record of the thirteen-month struggle between a community fighting to survive and a corporation dedicated to the bottom line.

title: Silver Streak (1976)
actors: Gene Wilder, Jill Clayburgh, Richard Pryor, Patrick McGoohan

title: High Anxiety (1977)
actors: Mel Brooks, Madeline Kahn, Cloris Leachman, Harvey Korman

actors: Liza Minnelli, Robert De Niro, Lionel Stander, Barry Primus

title: Turning Point, The (1977)
actors: Anne Bancroft, Shirley MacLaine, Tom Skerritt, Mikhail Baryshnikov
description: When her daughter joins a ballet company, a former dancer is forced to confront her long-ago decision to give up the stage to have a family.

title: Five Deadly Venoms (1978)
actors: Sheng Chiang, Chien Sun, Phillip Chung-Fung Kwok, Meng Lo
description: The final student of a dying martial arts master is instructed to locate the previous five students and defeat any evil ones among them.

title: Last Hurrah for Chivalry (Hao xia) (1979)
actors: Pai Wei, Damian Lau, Kong Lau, Chau-Wah Yim
description: A son tries to avenge his father, and gets two sword fighters to help him.

title: Clonus Horror, The (1979)

description: Politicians scheme to clone themselves, assuring immortal life.

title: Snake in the Eagle's Shadow (Se ying diu sau) (1978)

title: Hair (1979)

actors: George Hamilton, Susan Saint James, Richard Benjamin, Dick Shawn

There with the aid of assistant Renfield, he stumbles through typical New York city life situations while pursuing Cindy Soundheim. But her boyfriend, Doctor Jeff Rosenberg, realizes she is under the influence of a vampire, and tries his bumbling best to convince police Lt Ferguson of what is going on, and to help him stop Dracula.

title: Hitch Hikers Guide to the Galaxy, The (1981)
Blue Thunder (1983)
actors: Roy Scheider, Warren Oates, Candy Clark, Daniel Stern
description: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

title: Day After, The (1983)
actors: Jason Robards, JoBeth Williams, Steve Guttenberg, John Cullum
description: The effects of a devastating nuclear holocaust on small-town residents of eastern Kansas.

title: Eddie Murphy Delirious (1983)
actors: Eddie Murphy, James Argiro, Gus Loundermon, Brian O'Neal
description: Eddie Murphy's raunchy, raucous stand-up comedy routine is captured for posterity on this tape.

title: Norte, El (1984)
actors: Ernesto Gómez Cruz, David Villalpando, Zaide Silvia Gutiérrez, Alicia del Lago
description: After their family is killed in a government massacre, siblings Enrique and Rosa flee Guatemala and embark on a perilous journey to "El Norte": the United States.

title: Twilight Zone: The Movie (1983)
director: Joe Dante, John Landis, George Miller, Steven Spielberg
actors: Dan Aykroyd, Albert Brooks, Vic Morrow, Doug McGrath
description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

title: Boy Meets Girl (1984)

First break-up, first attempted murder: Alex tries to strangle Thomas, but gives up and wanders the streets. That evening, Mireille, a girl from provincial France who has come up to Paris to make commercials, is left by her boyfriend. Alex witnesses this separation. These two tormented souls run into each other at a party....

title: Cloak & Dagger (1984)
actors: Henry Thomas, Dabney Coleman, Michael Murphy, Christina Nigra
description: A young boy and his imaginary friend end up on the run while in possession of a top-secret spy gadget.
genres: Action, Adventure, Children, Crime, Mystery, Thriller

title: Ewok Adventure, The (a.k.a. Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure) (1984)
actors: Eric Walker, Warwick Davis, Fionnula Flanagan, Guy Boyd
description: Wicket the Ewok and his friends agree to help two shipwrecked human children, Mace and Cindel, on a quest to find their parents.

title: Silent Night, Deadly Night (1984)
actors: Lilyan Chauvin, Gilmer McCormick, Toni Nero, Robert Brian Wilson
description: Little Billy witnesses his parents getting killed by Santa after being warned by his senile grandpa that Santa punishes those who are naughty. Now Billy is 18 and out of the orphanage, and he has just become Santa himself.

title: Times of Harvey Milk, The (1984)
actors: Harvey Milk, Harvey Fierstein, Anne Kronenberg, Tory Hartmann
description: A documentary of the successful career and assassination of San Francisco's first elected gay city supervisor.

title: What Have I Done to Deserve This? (¿Qué he hecho yo para merecer esto!!) (1984)
actors: Carmen Maura, Luis Hostalot, Ryo Hiruma, Ángel de Andrés López
description: The vicissitudes of Gloria, a neurotic housewife, and her family's peculiar characters.

title: Death of a Salesman (1985)
actors: Dustin Hoffman, Kate Reid, John Malkovich, Stephen Lang
description: An aging traveling salesman recognizes the emptiness of his life and tries to fix it.

title: Ewoks: The Battle for Endor (1985)
actors: Wilford Brimley, Warwick Davis, Aubree Miller, Siân Phillips
description: Marauders raid the Ewok village and steal a power supply they believe to be magical. Wicket helps Cindel escape the evil witch Charal, and they befriend a hermit who may help them save the village.

title: Police Story (Ging chaat goo si) (1985)

title: Quiet Earth, The (1985)

description: A man named Zac Hobson awakens to find himself alone in the world. In a desperate attempt to search for others, he finds only two who have their own agenda.

title: Spies Like Us (1985)
actors: Mark Stewart, Sean Daniel, Bruce Davison, William Prince
description: Two bumbling government employees think they are U.S. spies, only to discover that they are actually decoys for Nuclear War.

title: White Nights (1985)
actors: Mikhail Baryshnikov, Gregory Hines, Jerzy Skolimowski, Helen Mirren
description: A Russian American ballet dancer's airplane is forced to land in USSR, where he's "repatriated". He stays with an American man married to a Russian. Will the American help him flee USSR?

title: 'Round Midnight (1986)
actors: Dexter Gordon, François Cluzet, Gabrielle Haker, Sandra Reaves-Phillips
description: A troubled, but talented musician flees the US to escape his problems, finding refuge and support in Paris.

title: Club Paradise (1986)

title: Sacrifice, The (Offret - Sacraficatio) (1986)

genres: Action, Adventure, Animation, Children, Fantasy, Sci-Fi

actors: Julius LeFlore, RCB, Roddy Piper, William Smith
description: After a worldwide nuclear war, where 68% of the male population was wiped out and virile men becoming a rarity, Sam Hell, a scavenger and a highly virile man, is assigned to help rescue a group of fertile women kidnapped by humanoid frogs.

title: Law of Desire (Ley del deseo, La) (1987)
actors: Eusebio Poncela, Carmen Maura, Antonio Banderas, Miguel Molina

title: Prince of Darkness (1987)
actors: Donald Pleasence, Jameson Parker, Victor Wong, Lisa Blount

title: Chinese Ghost Story, A (Sinnui yauwan) (1987)

title: Better Tomorrow II, A (Ying hung boon sik II) (1987)
actors: Lung Ti, Chow Yun-Fat, Leslie Cheung, Dean Shek

title: Dominick and Eugene (1988)
actors: Ray Liotta, Tom Hulce, Jamie Lee Curtis, Robert Levine

They live together, with Dominick working as garbage man to put Eugene through medical school. Their relationship becomes strained when Eugene must decide between his devotion to his brother, or his need to go away to complete his training. Things are also not helped by Dominick's co-worker, or Eugene's budding romance.

title: Killer Klowns from Outer Space (1988)
actors: Grant Cramer, Suzanne Snyder, John Allen Nelson, John Vernon
description: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.

title: Moonwalker (1988)

title: Alice (Neco z Alenky) (1988)
actors: Kristýna Kohoutová, Camilla Power
description: A surrealistic revision of Alice in Wonderland.

title: Life Is a Long Quiet River (La vie est un long fleuve tranquille) (1988)
actors: Benoît Magimel, Hélène Vincent, Valérie Lalande, Tara Römer

title: Kiki's Delivery Service (Majo no takkyûbin) (1989)
actors: Minami Takayama, Rei Sakuma, Kappei Yamaguchi, Keiko Toda

actors: Paul Hogan, Elias Koteas, Linda Kozlowski, Doreen Lang
description: A small-time crook becomes convinced he is an angel after a traumatic incident and resolves to perform the work of one.

title: Cry-Baby (1990)
actors: Johnny Depp, Amy Locane, Susan Tyrrell, Polly Bergen

title: Bullet in the Head (1990)

title: Ghost Dad (1990)
actors: Bill Cosby, Kimberly Russell, Denise Nicholas, Ian Bannen
description: A widowed father tries to support his children after he becomes a ghost in an accident.

title: Ju Dou (1990)

title: Krays, The (1990)
actors: Billie Whitelaw, Tom Bell, Gary Kemp, Martin Kemp

title: Lionheart (1990)
actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Harrison Page, Deborah Rennard, Lisa Pelikan

title: Nuns on the Run (1990)

title: Patlabor: The Movie (Kidô keisatsu patorebâ: The Movie) (1989)
actors: Toshio Furukawa, David Jarvis, Doug Erholtz, Mîna Tominaga

genres: Action, Animation, Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller

title: State of Grace (1990)
actors: Sean Penn, Ed Harris, Gary Oldman, Robin Wright
description: A New York cop is recruited to return to his hometown and infiltrate the mob ran by his best friend's brother.

title: 35 Up (1991)
actors: Bruce Balden, Jacqueline Bassett, Symon Basterfield, Andrew Brackfield

title: Days of Being Wild (A Fei jingjyuhn) (1990)
actors: Leslie Cheung, Maggie Cheung, Andy Lau, Carina Lau
description: A man tries to find out who his real mother is after the woman who raised him tells him the truth.

title: Begotten (1990)

title: Dutch (1991)
actors: Ed O'Neill, Ethan Embry, JoBeth Williams, Christopher McDonald
description: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from his prep school, only to learn that he isn't the nicest young man.

title: Hearts of Darkness: A Filmmakers Apocalypse (1991)

actors: Eleanor Coppola, John Milius, George Lucas, Francis Ford Coppola

actors: Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Paolo Bonacelli, Franco Volpi

title: Riki-Oh: The Story of Ricky (Lik Wong) (1991)

title: Mannequin 2: On the Move (1991)
actors: Kristy Swanson, William Ragsdale, Meshach Taylor, Terry Kiser
description: A young department store intern falls in love with a female store mannequin who is really a peasant girl fallen under a thousand year spell. She comes to life whenever he removes the cursed necklace from her.

title: Only Yesterday (Omohide poro poro) (1991)
actors: Miki Imai, Toshirô Yanagiba, Yoko Honna, Mayumi Izuka

title: Other People's Money (1991)
actors: Danny DeVito, Gregory Peck, Penelope Ann Miller, Piper Laurie
description: A corporate raider buys up shares in an undervalued company and falls in love with the founder's son's lawyer/step daughter. Let the battle begin.

title: Quigley Down Under (1990)
actors: Tom Selleck, Laura San Giacomo, Alan Rickman, Chris Haywood
description: Sharpshooter Matt Quigley is hired from Wyoming by an Australian rancher paying a very high price. But when Quigley arrives Down Under, all is not as it seems.

title: Captain America (1990)
actors: Matt Salinger, Ronny Cox, Ned Beatty, Darren McGavin
description: Frozen in the ice for decades, Captain America is freed to battle against archcriminal The Red Skull.

title: City Hunter (Sing si lip yan) (1993)
actors: Jackie Chan, Joey Wang, Kumiko Goto, Chingmy Yau

title: Porco Rosso (Crimson Pig) (Kurenai no buta) (1992)
actors: Shûichirô Moriyama, Tokiko Katô, Bunshi Katsura Vi, Tsunehiko Kamijô

Their mother has been arrested for forcing Rosetta (11 years old) to work as a prostitute. First the relation between Antonio and the children is tough, but it relaxes so they become temporary friends.

title: Ladybugs (1992)
actors: Rodney Dangerfield, Jackée Harry, Jonathan Brandis, Ilene Graff
description: To climb the corporate ladder to success, a guy agrees to coach the company's all-girls soccer team with the help of his secret weapon: his fiancee's son.

title: Mambo Kings, The (1992)
actors: Pablo Calogero, Scott Cohen, Mario Grillo, Ralph Irizarry

title: Shining Through (1992)
actors: Michael Douglas, Melanie Griffith, Liam Neeson, Joely Richardson

title: Sidekicks (1992)
actors: Chuck Norris, Beau Bridges, Jonathan Brandis, Mako
description: A bullied teen who fantasizes about being Chuck Norris' sidekick trains in martial arts to fulfill his dreams.

title: Heart in Winter, A (Un coeur en hiver) (1992)
actors: Daniel Auteuil, Emmanuelle Béart, André Dussollier, Elizabeth Bourgine

title: Visions of Light: The Art of Cinematography (1992)
director: Arnold Glassman, Todd McCarthy, Stuart Samuels
actors: Ernest R. Dickerson, Michael Chapman, Allen Daviau, Caleb Deschanel
description: Cameramen and women discuss the craft and art of cinematography, illustrating their points with clips from 100 films, from Birth of a Nation to Do the Right Thing.

title: Bad Boy Bubby (1993)
actors: Nicholas Hope, Claire Benito, Ralph Cotterill, Syd Brisbane
description: Bubby has spent thirty years trapped in the same small room, tricked by his mother. One day, he manages to escape, and, deranged and naive in equal measures, his adventure into the modern and nihilistic life begins.

title: Barbarians at the Gate (1993)
actors: James Garner, Jonathan Pryce, Peter Riegert, Joanna Cassidy
description: The president of a major tobacco company decides to buy the company himself, but a bidding war ensues as other companies make their own offers.

title: Fortress (1992)
actors: Christopher Lambert, Kurtwood Smith, Loryn Locklin, Clifton Collins Jr.

title: Mr. Nanny (1993)
actors: Afa Anoai, Ed Leslie, Butch Brickell, James Coffey
description: A former professional wrestler is hired to be the bodyguard/nanny for a couple of bratty kids whose inventor father is being stalked by a rival.

title: Snapper, The (1993)

title: Sonatine (Sonachine) (1993)
actors: Takeshi Kitano, Aya Kokumai, Tetsu Watanabe, Masanobu Katsumura

title: Darkman II: Return of Durant, The (1995)
actors: Larry Drake, Arnold Vosloo, Kim Delaney, Renée O'Connor
description: Darkman and Durant return and they hate each other as much as ever. This time, Durant has plans to take over the city's drug trade using high-tech weaponry. Darkman must step in and try to stop Durant once and for all.

title: Freaked (1993)
actors: Brooke Shields, William Sadler, Eduardo Ricard, Henry Carbo
description: A vain actor, his best friend, and an activist end up at a mutant freak farm run by a weirdo scientist.

title: Fist of Legend (Jing wu ying xiong) (1994)
actors: Jet Li, Shinobu Nakayama, Siu-Ho Chin, Billy Chow
description: In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.

title: Major League II (1994)
actors: Charlie Sheen, Tom Berenger, Corbin Bernsen, Dennis Haysbert
description: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

title: My Father the Hero (1994)
actors: Gérard Depardieu, Katherine Heigl, Dalton James, Lauren Hutton
description: A teenage girl on vacation in the Bahamas with her divorced father tries to impress a potential boyfriend by saying that her father is actually her lover.

title: Pure Formality, A (Pura formalità, Una) (1994)
actors: Gérard Depardieu, Roman Polanski, Sergio Rubini, Nicola Di Pinto
description: Onoff is a famous writer who hasn't published any new books for quite some time and has become a recluse. When he is picked up by the police one stormy night, without any identification, out of breath and running madly, without clear memory of recent events, the Inspector is suspicious. Through interrogatory dialectic, the head of this lonely, isolated, broken-down police station tries to establish what has happened, by delving into the mind of his writer-hero, and clearing up a mysterious killing.

title: Langoliers, The (1995)
genres: Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller

title: Last Wedding, The (Kivenpyörittäjän kylä) (1995)
actors: Martti Suosalo, Henrika Andersson, Matti Varjo, Tanja Kortelainen
description: Pekka returns to his native village to attend a wedding. The village has lost its younger generations, and the movie tells the story of the last wedding in the village.

title: Last of the Dogmen (1995)
actors: Tom Berenger, Barbara Hershey, Kurtwood Smith, Steve Reevis
description: A Montana bounty hunter and an anthropologist discover a tribe of Native Americans living in a settlement isolated from the rest of the world.

title: Whisper of the Heart (Mimi wo sumaseba) (1995)
actors: Yoko Honna, Issey Takahashi, Takashi Tachibana, Shigeru Muroi
description: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

title: Street Fighter II: The Animated Movie (Sutorîto Faitâ II gekijô-ban) (1994)
actors: Kôjiro Shimizu, Kenji Haga, Miki Fujitani, Masane Tsukayama

title: Summer's Tale, A (Conte d'été) (1996)
actors: Melvil Poupaud, Amanda Langlet, Gwenaëlle Simon, Aurelia Nolin
description: A shy maths graduate takes a holiday in Dinard before starting his first job. He hopes his sort-of girlfriend will join him, but soon strikes up a friendship with another girl working in town. She in turn introduces him to a further young lady who fancies him. Thus the quiet young lad finds he is having to do some tricky juggling in territory new to him.

title: Late Shift, The (1996)

actors: Sancho Gracia, Ángel de Andrés López, Carmen Maura, Eusebio Poncela
description: Julián Torralba is a former movie stuntman in Almeria, Spain. He and several of his colleagues, who once made a living in American Westerns shot in Spain, now are reduced to doing stunt shows for minuscule audiences on the decaying set built for those old Westerns. Julián wrestles with dark memories of the death of his son, also a stuntman, and with estrangement from his daughter-in-law Laura and her son Carlos. Carlos, a young boy, becomes intrigued with his late father's life and runs away to join Julián and his band of has-beens. There Carlos is initiated into the rambunctious life of these hard-drinking faux cowboys. But when Laura, a powerful executive looking for a new site for a tourist resort, learns that Carlos has joined the hated Julián, she moves to destroy even this remnant of Julián's once-proud career. Julián and the cowboys decide to fight back the only way they know how.

Along the way, he dramatizes Dr. Heimlich's search for a maneuver, the naming of Engelbert Humperdinck, Scooby and Shaggy as archetypes, Neil Armstrong on the moon, society's tolerance of mass murderers, how we sing anthems and carols, Hollywood adapting British films, JFK's trip to Berlin, thoughts on puberty, and how to work schoolbook-French phrases into Parisian conversation. A group of assassins wait by Sakurada Gate to kill the lord of the House of Ii, a powerful man in the Tokugawa government, which has ruled Japan for 300 years. They suspect a traitor in their midst, and their suspicions fall on Niiro, an impoverished ronin who dreams of samurai status, and Kurihara, an aristocratic samurai who befriends Niiro. Niiro longs to identify his father, knowing he is a high-ranking official who will disclose himself only if Niiro achieves samurai status. With American ships in Japan's harbors, cynicism among the assassins, and change in the air, Niiro resolves to reach ends that may prove ephemeral.

title: Brainstorm (2001)
actors: Rodrigo Santoro, Othon Bastos, Cássia Kis, Dani Nefussi
description: A trip to the mental institution hell. This odyssey is lived by Neto, a middle class teenager, who lives a normal life until his father sends him to a mental institution after finding drugs on his pocket. The marijuana cigarette is just the final drop that exposes the family tragedy. Send to a mental institution, Neto gets to know a completely absurd, inhumane reality in which the people are devoured by a corrupt and cruel institution system. The documentary type language used by the director give this movie a sensation of realty that increases even more the impact of the emotions Neto goes through. In the mental institution, Neto is forced to mature. The transformations that he goes through change this relations with his father.

title: Maxed Out: Hard Times, Easy Credit and the Era of Predatory Lenders (2006)
actors: Beth Naef, Mike Hudson, Louis C. K. , Catherine Brown
description: When Hurricane Katrina ravaged America's Gulf Coast, it laid bare an uncomfortable reality-America is not only far from the world's wealthiest nation; it is crumbling beneath a staggering burden of individual and government debt. Maxed Out takes us on a journey deep inside the American debt-style, where everything seems okay as long as the minimum monthly payment arrives on time. Sure, most of us may have that sinking feeling that something isn't quite right, but we're told not to worry. After all, there's always more credit! Maxed Out shows how the modern financial industry really works, explains the true definition of "preferred customer" and tells us why the poor are getting poorer and the rich getting richer. By turns hilarious and profoundly disturbing, Maxed Out paints a picture of a national nightmare which is all too real for most of us.

description: A mysterious radio message is beamed around the world, and among the engineers who receive it are Los, the hero, and his colleague Spiridonov. Los is an individualist dreamer. Aelita is the daughter of Tuskub, the ruler of a totalitarian state on Mars in which the working class are put into cold storage when they are not needed. With a telescope, Aelita is able to watch Los. As if by telepathy, Los obsesses about being watched by her. After some hugger-mugger involving the murder of his wife and a pursuing detective, Los takes the identity of Spiridonov and builds a spaceship. With the revolutionary Gusev, he travels to Mars, but the Earthlings and Aelita are thrown into prison by the dictator. Gusev and Los begin a proletarian uprising, and Aelita offers to lead the revolution, but she then establishes her own totalitarian regime. Los is shocked by this development and attempts to stop Aelita, and then reality and fantasy become confused, and Los discovers what has really happened.
genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Romance, Sci-Fi, Thriller

actors: John Cusack, Amanda Peet, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Thandiwe Newton

Danny's search becomes progressively more pathetic once he and his family learn that Bart, the school's biggest dweeb, not only secured a date for the prom, but got a hotel room as well.

Temple Grandin (2010)

title: Mike Bassett: England Manager (2001)
actors: Kevin Piper, Ricky Tomlinson, Malcolm Terris, Philip Dunbar
description: The manager of England's national football unexpectedly succumbs to a heart attack, and suddenly the search is on for a replacement. Most people who seem qualified for the position have the good sense to turn it down, and so the responsibility falls to Mike Bassett, a scruffy and loud-mouthed lout whose claim to football fame is leading a previously undistinguished team to a league championship. Bassett insists that England will win the World Cup under his leadership, but that's before he replaces his star player with a once-gifted footballer who has since developed a drinking problem, and hired a one-time car salesman as his assistant. After stunning losses to Poland and Belgium, Bassett goes from a favorite of both fans and the press to one of the most hated men in England; hoping to whip his team into shape, he subjects them to the high-tech training methods of eccentric Dr. Shoegaarten, which injures more players than it helps. Despite Bassett's ineptitude, England manages to qualify for the World Cup tournament thanks to group opponents Turkey losing their final game, and he flies to Rio with his team in hopes of somehow turning their bad luck around.

title: Crazies, The (2010)
actors: Timothy Olyphant, Radha Mitchell, Joe Anderson, Danielle Panabaker

title: [REC]² (2009)

title: Union: The Business Behind Getting High, The (2007)
actors: Adam Scorgie, Chris Bennett, Steve Bloom, Renee Bojee
description: BC's illegal marijuana trade industry has evolved into a business giant, dubbed by some involved as 'The Union', Commanding upwards of $7 billion Canadian annually. With up to 85% of 'BC Bud' being exported to the United States, the trade has become an international issue. Follow filmmaker Adam Scorgie as he demystifies the underground market and brings to light how an industry can function while remaining illegal. Through growers, police officers, criminologists, economists, doctors, politicians and pop culture icons, Scorgie examines the cause and effect nature of the business - an industry that may be profiting more by being illegal.

Then, Tigger and Roo go out for a bounce and get caught in a tree, which Tigger is too afraid to get out of, and Rabbit makes Tigger promise that if they help get Tigger down, that Tigger can never bounce again. However, the boys find in the police station that the woman is the dangerous thief Rebeca Expósito, who has just stolen two million pesetas from a bank and is wanted. The group decides to leave the woman in the hole without any food to force her to give the robbed money to them. Meanwhile, Peti and Eugenio that are fans of the movie "Zombie Invasion", decide to make a voodoo ceremony with Rebecca to transform her into a zombie. Meanwhile, Goku and Krillin attend the World Martial Arts Tournament, which is hosted by the Emperor; Bora and his son Upa attempt to hide the dragon ball they found from the emperor's forces, which are under the control of the evil Shen and General Tao; and Bulma conducts her own search for the dragon balls with the help of Yamcha, Puar, and Oolong.

But when members of the spirit squad start turning up dead, the girls must put aside their differences and struggle to survive the murderous rage of a crazed psycho-killer lurking among them!

title: Geri's Game (1997)
actors: Bob Peterson

Dragon Ball Z: Bio-Broly (Doragon bôru Z 11: Sûpâ senshi gekiha! Katsu no wa ore da) (1994)

title: Anaconda: The Offspring (2008)
actors: David Hasselhoff, Crystal Allen, Ryan McCluskey, Patrick Regis
description: A mercenary-for-hire accepts a mission from a billionaire to capture a dangerous snake that could possibly help cure a terminal illness.

title: Christmas Carol, A (1999)
actors: Patrick Stewart, Richard E. Grant, Joel Grey, Ian McNeice

description: Womanizing Charlie is shot by an angry husband and falls in the sea. He arrives home after his memorial as a cute, amnesic woman. His old friend helps her/him.

title: For the Birds (2000)
actors: Ralph Eggleston
description: With Ralph Eggleston. A group of snooty birds roosting on a telephone wire get their just deserts when a goofy bird drops in.

One day they receive a letter from the Ministry of Education: because of a formal error, they must retake the exam. With the initial shock now past, they grasp the opportunity to meet again, to share laughters and to cram together like they used to. On the other hand, they are not the same persons they were two decades before...

actors: Masako Nozawa, Kazuyuki Sogabe, Yûko Mita, Takeshi Watabe

title: Dragon Ball Z: The History of Trunks (Doragon bôru Z: Zetsubô e no hankô!! Nokosareta chô senshi - Gohan to Torankusu) (1993)
actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru, Ryô Horikawa
description: In a dark future where the Androids have taken over Earth, Gohan and his student Trunks are the last defense against these deadly killing machines.

actors: Masako Nozawa, Tôru Furuya, Miki Itô, Kazuyuki Sogabe
description: Goku Jr. is the great-great-grandson of the legendary warrior Goku, but unlike his predecessor he's not a brave fighter. He's constantly picked on by school bullies--his grandmother Pan sees this and is worried, but even though Goku Jr. is not a strong and powerful saiyan, he has a kind heart, and Pan loves him. When Pan gets sick, Goku Jr. realizes that he must do something if he doesn't want to lose her. Then he remembers about the legends of the Dragon Balls. It was told that they grant a wish to the bearer, and Goku Jr. needs a magical wish more than ever, so he sets out to find the dragon ball that his grandmother told him about.

actors: Javier Drolas, Miguel Dedovich, Pilar López de Ayala, Miguel Alvarez

And the prospect is one that does not entirely displease him, as this backwoods offers very little excitement other than the fantastic meals with his cooking-obsessed Grandma or the constant stress with his Beatles-loving Dad. He is supported by Rudi Birkenberger, now a department-store detective but previously with Franz in the Munich detective squad until both were suspended. The Höpfl case gets even more tangled when a second corpse is found, that of a drug-addict hustler with whom Höpfl had been in contact. actors: Charles Hubbell, Matt Amendt, Steve Sweere, Dawn Brodey
description: In the world of MIDNIGHT, it is a time of overwhelming darkness. After three ages of scheming and war, the dark god Izrador has finally defeated the heroes and armies of the free races. Now, he rules the world of Aryth with an iron fist. Enslaved under the Shadow, the race of men leads an oppressed existence, and the elves and dwarves have retreated to distant forests and mountains, where their desperate resistance is slowly succumbing to the unyielding might of the Shadow. Investigating the disappearance of a legate priest, the infamous Mag Kiln has been ordered by the church to travel to the small Erenlander town of Blackweir. There, he soon becomes entangled in an old mystery and begins to uncover not only the forbidden legacy of the town, but the malevolent, prophetic force that grows within him. MIDNIGHT CHRONICLES is the epic narrative that tells the tale of two legendary characters -- one for the cause of good, the other for the cause of evil. This is the story of their rise, their struggle, and ultimately their fate, as their destinies become intertwined with that of the world and the dark god that occupies it.

title: Ward 13 (2003)
actors: Brett Archer, Ren Klyce
description: Ben, our main character, wakes up in an unusual hospital after seemingly landing on an asphalt road due to a car collision. He later wakes up to the sound of dog barking and decides to explore the hospital. After he studies the hospital, noticing all the details from the plain white hallways from the surgical tools spread about the rooms, he realizes this isn't a normal hospital. He then hears footsteps and goes into the nearest room where he finds an experimental patient. The patient, lying on a bed moaning, comes to life in a horrific manner and leaves our main character, Ben, running for his life through the hospital while being chased by surgeons along the way. Ben realizes that the only chance of survival is leaving the Hospital with haste. Run Ben, Run.

description: A cat and a mouse must outsmart a band of pirates to find buried treasure.

title: Jeff Dunham: All Over the Map (2014)

description: In a post apocalyptic future, two rival gangs fight for control of Frazier Park by playing "Beat Beat Revelation", a deadly version of Dance, Dance, Revolution(TM).

actors: Katie Aselton, Patrick Brice, Mark Duplass

title: The Face of an Angel (2015)
actors: Ava Acres, Daniel Brühl, Kate Beckinsale, Anjella Mackintosh
description: Both a journalist and a documentary filmmaker chase the story of a murder and its prime suspect.

title: Wild Horses (2015)
actors: Robert Duvall, James Franco, Darien Willardson, Angie Cepeda
description: A detective opens up a fifteen-year-old missing persons case, and begins to suspect that the missing boy was murdered, and that a local rancher was involved.

title: Search Party (2014)
actors: Adam Pally, T. J. Miller, Thomas Middleditch, Shannon Woodward
description: A pair of friends embark on a mission to reunite their pal with the woman he was going to marry.

title: The Squeeze (2015)
actors: Katherine LaNasa, Christopher McDonald, Jeremy Sumpter, Mekia Cox
description: A humble young man with uncommon skills from a small southern town gets caught up in high stakes golf matches between big-time gamblers until the game becomes life and death.

title: Careful What You Wish For (2015)
actors: Nick Jonas, Kiki Harris, David Sherrill, Graham Rogers
description: A guy gets more than he bargained for after entering into an affair with the wife of an investment banker. Soon, a suspicious death and substantial life insurance policy embroil him in a scandal.

title: Robot Overlords (2014)
actors: Ben Kingsley, Gillian Anderson, Callan McAuliffe, Ella Hunt
description: Earth has been conquered by robots from a distant galaxy. Survivors are confined to their houses and must wear electronic implants, risking incineration by robot sentries if they venture outside.

title: Bad Asses on the Bayou (2015)
actors: Danny Trejo, Danny Glover, John Amos, Loni Love
description: Frank Vega and Bernie Pope return, this time to Louisiana in an attempt to find a kidnapped friend.

title: The Eye: Infinity (2005)

description: When three generations of one family temporarily have to live together under one roof chaos ensues.

title: Villain (1971)
actors: Richard Burton, Ian McShane, Nigel Davenport, Donald Sinden

title: The Lovers (2015)
actors: Josh Hartnett, Bipasha Basu, Tamsin Egerton, James Mackay
description: An epic, sweeping and riveting tale of an impossible love set across two time periods and continents.

title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016)
actors: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams, Jesse Eisenberg
description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

title: Mortuary (1983)

description: Convinced that her father's death was not accidental, a beautiful girl decides to investigate to find out the truth, aided by her boyfriend. Her sleuthing draws her to a local mortuary, where many secrets will be revealed.

title: April Morning (1988)
actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Susan Blakely, Chad Lowe, Robert Urich
description: On the morning of April 19, 1775, the American Revolution began with the "shot heard 'round the world".

title: Amy (2015)

title: That Demon Within (2014)
actors: Daniel Wu, Nick Cheung, Shatina Chen, Kai-Chi Liu
description: A dutiful cop, guilt-ridden over saving the life of a gang leader, becomes obsessed with bringing down the crime syndicate of the man he saved.

title: Carnival Magic (1981)
actors: Don Stewart, Jennifer Houlton, Howard Segal, Regina Carrol
description: A magician in a carnival--who actually can read minds and levitate people and objects--works with a superintelligent chimp named Alex, who can also talk. The magician and the chimp soon become the stars of the carnival, drawing in big crowds. However, the wild-animal trainer, who has been displaced by the team as the carnival's top act, decides to kidnap Alex and sell him to a medical laboratory for experimentation, thereby getting rid of his competition.

actors: Hisao Egawa, Toshio Furukawa, Ryô Horikawa, Takeshi Kusao
description: Dr. Raichi, a survivor of the Tuffle race that was eliminated from Planet Vegeta by the Saiyans, is trying to take revenge on the surviving Saiyans by killing them and Earth's population. Goku, Gohan, Piccolo, Trunks, and Vegeta must find and destroy generators emitting deadly Destron Gas before all life on Earth is extinguished, then find Raichi and stop him.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection of F (2015)
actors: Masako Nozawa, Ryô Horikawa, Hiromi Tsuru, Masaharu Satô
description: One peaceful day on Earth, two remnants of Freeza's army named Sorube and Tagoma arrive searching for the Dragon Balls with the aim of reviving Freeza. They succeed, and Freeza subsequently seeks revenge on the Saiya-jin.

title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E. (2015)
actors: Henry Cavill, Armie Hammer, Alicia Vikander, Elizabeth Debicki
description: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.

title: Sorrow (2015)
actors: Vannessa Vasquez, Andrew Sensenig, Melissa Mars, Eric Martinez
description: A couple of depraved killers find themselves in a different situation when the survivor takes matters into her own hands.

title: 7 Days in Hell (2015)
actors: Andy Samberg, Kit Harington, Fred Armisen, David Copperfield
description: A fictional documentary-style expose on the rivalry between two of the greatest tennis players of all-time who battled it out in a 2001 match that lasted seven days.

title: The Walk (2015)
actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Guillaume Baillargeon, Émilie Leclerc, Mark Trafford
description: In 1974, high-wire artist Philippe Petit recruits a team of people to help him realize his dream: to walk the immense void between the World Trade Center towers.

title: 13 Hours (2016)
actors: John Krasinski, James Badge Dale, Pablo Schreiber, David Denman
description: During an attack on a U.S. compound in Libya, a security team struggles to make sense out of the chaos.

title: There Will Come a Day (2013)
actors: Jasmine Trinca, Anne Alvaro, Sonia Gessner, Pia Engleberth

actors: Geoff Stults, Mena Suvari, Jennifer Finnigan, Josh Hopkins
description: The story of Vince, New England's most successful divorce attorney. To Vince, life is one big competition, and losing is unacceptable. This also applies in his dating life with his love 'em and leave 'em approach. Then Vince meets Jane, who is beautiful, successful and also extremely driven. Together they enter into a series of entertaining wagers with each other where the winner gets to decide the fate of the loser.

title: The Gallows (2015)
actors: Reese Mishler, Pfeifer Brown, Ryan Shoos, Cassidy Gifford

title: Feast (2014)
actors: Steve Apostolina, Kirk Baily, Ben Bledsoe, David Cowgill

title: Joe Dirt 2: Beautiful Loser (2015)
actors: David Spade, Brittany Daniel, Patrick Warburton, Mark McGrath
description: When happy family man Joe Dirt gets himself transported to the recent past, he begins an epic journey to return to his loved ones in the present.

title: Return to Treasure Island (1988)
actors: Valeriy Bessarab, Armen Dzhigarkhanyan, Viktor Andrienko, Vyacheslav Dubinin
description: Cartoon adaptation of Robert Louis Stevenson's most famous adventure novel.

title: Nasu: Summer in Andalusia (2003)
actors: Yô Ôizumi, Shin'ichi Hatori, Minoru Hirano, Hiroaki Hirata

title: Dark Places (2015)
actors: Charlize Theron, Sterling Jerins, Nicholas Hoult, Christina Hendricks

title: Massu Engira Maasilamani (2015)
actors: Suriya, Nayanthara, Parthiban Radhakrishnan, Samuthirakani

title: The Revenant (2015)
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hardy, Domhnall Gleeson, Will Poulter
description: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

title: Irrational Man (2015)
actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone, Joe Stapleton, Nancy Carroll
description: A tormented philosophy professor finds a will to live when he commits an existential act.

title: Exte: Hair Extensions (2007)
actors: Chiaki Kuriyama, Megumi Satô, Tsugumi, Eri Machimoto
description: About hair extensions that attack the women that wear them.

title: Ooops! Noah is Gone... (2015)
actors: Dermot Magennis, Callum Maloney, Tara Flynn, Ava Connolly
description: It's the end of the world. A flood is coming. Luckily for Dave and his son Finny, a couple of clumsy Nestrians, an Ark has been built to save all animals. But as it turns out, Nestrians aren't allowed. Sneaking on board with the involuntary help of Hazel and her daughter Leah, two Grymps, they think they're safe. Until the curious kids fall off the Ark. Now Finny and Leah struggle to survive the flood and hungry predators and attempt to reach the top of a mountain, while Dave and Hazel must put aside their differences, turn the Ark around, and save their kids. It definitely won't be smooth sailing.

actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rachel McAdams, Forest Whitaker, Oona Laurence
description: After a fatal incident sends him on a rampant path of destruction, a champion boxer fights to get custody of his daughter and revive his professional career.

title: Sicario (2015)
actors: Emily Blunt, Benicio Del Toro, Josh Brolin, Victor Garber

title: Goodnight Mommy (Ich seh ich seh) (2014)
actors: Lukas Schwarz, Elias Schwarz, Susanne Wuest, Hans Escher
description: Twin boys move to a new house with their mother after she has face-changing cosmetic surgery, but under the bandages is someone the boys don't recognize.

title: 10 Cent Pistol (2015)
actors: Jena Malone, JT Alexander, Damon Alexander, Joe Mantegna
description: A story about two lifelong criminals who maneuver through the shady underbelly of Los Angeles in search of wealth, love and redemption.

title: Before We Go (2014)
actors: Chris Evans, Alice Eve, Emma Fitzpatrick, John Cullum
description: Two strangers stuck in Manhattan for the night grow into each other's most trusted confidants when an evening of unexpected adventure forces them to confront their fears and take control of their lives.

title: Anomalisa (2015)
actors: David Thewlis, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Tom Noonan
description: A man crippled by the mundanity of his life experiences something out of the ordinary.

title: Colonia (2016)
actors: Emma Watson, Daniel Brühl, Michael Nyqvist, Richenda Carey

title: Ghost in the Shell Arise - Border 2: Ghost Whispers (2013)

description: Witness the formation of the legendary Public Security Section 9. When a clandestine organization hacks every car in the city, Kusanagi recruits a lethal team of cyber operatives to clamp down on the chaos and make the city safe again.

title: How to Make Love Like an Englishman (2014)
actors: Pierce Brosnan, Salma Hayek, Jessica Alba, Malcolm McDowell
description: A drama about a Cambridge poetry professor who begins to re-evaluate his life of Byronic excess.

title: Fracchia contro Dracula (1985)
actors: Paolo Villaggio, Edmund Purdom, Gigi Reder, Ania Pieroni
description: Fracchia is desperate: he has to sell a house within three days, or otherwise his boss will fire him. Mister Filini comes to him, but he asks the impossible, a house with at least five bathrooms for a few thousand dollars. Incredibly, they find a house, a castle in Transylvania which happens to be own by a count Vlad... Filini doesn't want to buy the castle without seeing it first, so the two of them travel to Transylvania, where they meet the count and his sister, who has a crush on Fracchia and decides to marry him! Meanwhile, the sister of a vampire hunter who was killed by Dracula is seeking to revenge her brother.

actors: Alexandra Breckenridge, Christopher Rodriguez Marquette, Jake McDorman, Doug Jones
description: A small town news team discovers a box of video tapes where a faceless figure dressed in a dark suit, haunts and torments a family... slowly driving them insane. Soon after, they realize that the "Operator" has begun to stalk them as well.

title: Madly in Love (1981)
actors: Adriano Celentano, Ornella Muti, Adolfo Celi, Milla Sannoner
description: Barnaba, a rude bus driver who enjoys the attention of women, one day meets Principessa Cristina, the princess of a local principality.

title: Hollywood Chainsaw Hookers (1988)
actors: Gunnar Hansen, Linnea Quigley, John Henry Richardson, Dawn Wildsmith
description: A detective embarks on a mission to track down a woman in L.A.'s seedy nightclubs, only to come face-to-face with a blood-thirsty cult of lethally beautiful prostitutes. Is he the next victim of Hollywood's demented Chainsaw Hookers?

title: Love (2015)
actors: Aomi Muyock, Karl Glusman, Klara Kristin, Ugo Fox
description: Murphy is an American living in Paris who enters a highly sexually and emotionally charged relationship with Electra. Unaware of the effect it will have on their relationship, they invite their pretty neighbor into their bed.

title: Room (2015)
actors: Brie Larson, Jacob Tremblay, Sean Bridgers, Wendy Crewson
description: A little boy is held captive in a room with his mother since his birth, so he has never known the world outside.

title: The Runner (2015)
actors: Nicolas Cage, Sarah Paulson, Peter Fonda, Connie Nielsen
description: In the aftermath of the 2010 BP oil spill, an idealistic but flawed politician is forced to confront his dysfunctional life after his career is destroyed in a sex scandal.

title: The Gift (2015)
actors: Jason Bateman, Rebecca Hall, Joel Edgerton, Allison Tolman

title: George Carlin: Jammin' in New York (1992)
actors: George Carlin
description: When George Carlin is asked which HBO concert is his favorite, his answer is always, "Jammin' In New York." The reasons are several: It was his first HBO show done live; it was the first he had done in his hometown, New York City; and it was the largest audience he had ever worked before: 6,500.But Carlin says it also represented a newfound sophistication in his writing. "It was the first time I had done truly extended pieces consisting of separate sections all flowing together. It was a big leap for me."The show, taped at the Paramount Theater in Madison Square Garden and winner of the 1992 CableACE Award, is a perfect blend of biting social commentary and more gently-observed observational pieces.

title: The Witch (2015)
actors: Anya Taylor-Joy, Ralph Ineson, Kate Dickie, Harvey Scrimshaw
description: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic and possession.

title: Men & Chicken (2015)
actors: David Dencik, Mads Mikkelsen, Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Søren Malling
description: Through getting to know their unknown family, two outcast brothers discover a horrible truth about themselves and their relatives.

title: The Escort (2015)
actors: Lyndsy Fonseca, Michael Doneger, Tommy Dewey, Bruce Campbell
description: Desperate for a good story, a sex-addicted journalist throws himself into the world of high-class escorts when he starts following a Stanford-educated prostitute.

actors: David Tennant, Lindsay Duncan, Peter O'Brien, Aleksandar Mikic
description: In a Mars base the inhabitants are being infected by a mysterious water creature which takes over its victims. The Doctor is thrust into the middle of this catastrophe knowing a larger one is waiting around the corner.

actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis
description: Peter makes good on another power outage at home by retelling Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back.

title: Visit, The (2015)
actors: Olivia DeJonge, Ed Oxenbould, Deanna Dunagan, Peter McRobbie
description: Two siblings become increasingly frightened by their grandparents' disturbing behavior while visiting them on vacation.

title: Secret in Their Eyes (2015)
actors: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Nicole Kidman, Julia Roberts, Dean Norris
description: A tight-knit team of rising investigators, along with their supervisor, is suddenly torn apart when they discover that one of their own teenage daughters has been brutally murdered.

title: Jeff Ross Roasts Criminals: Live at Brazos County Jail (2015)
Battle For Sevastopol (2015)
actors: Yuliya Peresild, Evgeniy Tsyganov, Oleg Vasilkov, Nikita Tarasov
description: A story of Lyudmila Pavlichenko, the most successful female sniper in history.

actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Kristen Stewart, Topher Grace, Connie Britton
description: A stoner - who is in fact a government agent - is marked as a liability and targeted for extermination. But he's too well-trained and too high for them to handle.

title: Cop Car (2015)

description: A small-town sheriff sets out to find the two kids who have taken his car on a joy ride.

title: Tangerine (2015)
actors: Kitana Kiki Rodriguez, Mya Taylor, Karren Karagulian, Mickey O'Hagan

He is befriended by a criminally insane, memory-wiped, homeless girl. Meanwhile, the corporate entity who manufactured and sold him plots to kill him because of his malfunction.

title: Joy (2015)
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Bradley Cooper, Edgar Ramírez

actors: Munro Chambers, Laurence Leboeuf, Michael Ironside, Edwin Wright

actors: Paul Anderson, Tom Hardy, Christopher Eccleston, Joshua Hill

title: Deathgasm (2015)
actors: Milo Cawthorne, James Joshua Blake, Kimberley Crossman, Sam Berkley

title: Steve Jobs: The Man in the Machine (2015)
actors: Steve Jobs, Alex Gibney, Steve Wozniak, Michael S. Malone

actors: Luis Cancu, Atman, Berthony, Bruno

He has feelings for a human woman named Yuri (Ito Ohno) whom he has seen from a writer who is scripting her life from heaven. He knows that Yuri is condemned to die in a car accident. To save the woman, Chasuke goes down to this world.

Filmmakers and food lovers Jen and Grant dive into the issue of waste from farm, through retail, all the way to the back of their own fridge. After catching a glimpse of the billions of dollars of good food that is tossed each year in North America, they pledge to quit grocery shopping and survive only on discarded food. What they find is truly shocking.

actors: Sylvia Hoeks, Jennifer Hoffman, Flip Van der Kuil, Huub Smit

They find that some type of disaster has de-populated the Idaho region and, by implication, the nation or perhaps the world. Facing an unknown, barren future of abandoned towns and deserted vehicles, void of radio signals or any signs of air or land traffic, they encounter an abandoned freight train filled with bagged bodies. Their further discoveries of humanity's future fate is less than rosy. They also learn their time travel was not without significant costs to their own health. After one of the group travels further into the future, she encounters a family in a futuristic automobile, which implies that humankind has recovered from the disaster. Or have they?

It gives him nightmares that the police seems unwilling to believe him over the manipulative witch, until they find...

description: The Doctor and Clara face their Last Christmas. Trapped on an Arctic base, under attack from terrifying creatures, who are you going to call? Santa Claus!

title: Doctor Who: The Doctor, the Widow and the Wardrobe (2011)

Three years later, a devastated Madge escapes war-torn London with her two children for a dilapidated house in Dorset. She is crippled with grief at the news her husband has been lost over the channel, but determined to give Lily and Cyril the best Christmas ever. The Arwells are surprised to be greeted by a madcap caretaker whose mysterious Christmas gift leads them into a magical wintry world. Here, Madge will learn how to be braver than she ever thought possible. And that wishes can come true...

title: A Perfect Day (2015)
actors: Benicio Del Toro, Tim Robbins, Olga Kurylenko, Mélanie Thierry
description: A group of aid workers work to resolve a crisis in an armed conflict zone.

title: Masked Avengers (1981)
actors: Phillip Chung-Fung Kwok, Siu-Ho Chin, Sheng Chiang, Ke Chu
description: Philip Kwok (Lizard venom) plays a repentant killer who vows to destroy the masked gang of which he was a member. A young fighter and his martial arts brothers (incl Chiang Sheng, venom student) come to the town to catch the killers, but one of them is not to be trusted!

The time has come for the one armed swordsman to return.

description: Moritaka Mashiro, a junior high student, forgets his notebook in class. His classmate Akito Takagi, notes Mashiro's drawings in it and asks him to become a manga artist to his stories. Mashiro declines. Takagi incites Mashiro to meet with Miho Azuki, Mashiro's crush, and tells her the two plan to become mangakas (manga artists). In response, Azuki reveals her plans to be a seiyuu (voice actress). Mashiro proposes to her that they should both marry when Azuki becomes a voice actress for the anime adaptation of their manga. The two then start creating their manga, under the pen name Muto Ashirogi, in hopes of getting serialized in Weekly Shounen Jump.

Upon arrival, Maggie runs into Luca, a handsome former lover who is still a bachelor and lives with his eighty-year-old mother, Carmen. Summer (missing her "bad boy" boyfriend in NYC) and Carmen (secretly planning a wedding against Luca's wishes to Marcelino, her one true love in Rome) impulsively steal Luca's car and race off to Rome. Maggie and Luca quickly pursue allowing the two mismatched couples to spend some time together and develop a new understanding of each other.

"In order to go back to being a human again, you must take back all of Kiss-shot's limbs." After receiving advice from Meme Oshino, an expert in the supernatural, Koyomi prepares to go into battle. Awaiting him are three powerful vampire hunters-Dramaturgy, a giant vampire hunter who is a vampire himself. Episode, a half-vampire who wields an enormous cross, and Guillotinecutter, a quiet man who specializes in killing vampires. title: A German Life (2016)
director: Christian Krönes, Olaf S. Müller, Roland Schrotthofer, Florian Weigensamer
actors: Brunhilde Pomsel
description: Brunhilde Pomsel describes herself as an "apolitical girl" and a "figure on the margins," but she got closer to one of the worst criminals in world history than anyone else left alive. Today aged 104, Pomsel served as Nazi Propaganda Minister Joseph Goebbels' stenographer. Brunhilde Pomsel's life mirrors all the major breaks and continuities of the 20th century. Many people think that the dangers of war and fascism have been overcome. Brunhilde Pomsel makes it clear that this is not case. "A German Life" makes the viewer automatically ask: How would I have acted? What principles might I have betrayed to advance my career? Her extraordinary biography and personal journey into the past lead to the disturbing but timeless question: How reliable is my own moral compass?

title: Gintama: The Movie (2010)
actors: Tomokazu Sugita, Daisuke Sakaguchi, Rie Kugimiya, Akira Ishida
description: The silver-haired samurai Sakata Gintoki investigates the disappearance of a legendary sword named Benizakura while his partners Kagura and Shimura Shinpachi try to find out what has happened to Gintoki's friend, Kotaro Katsura.

title: anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day - The Movie (2013)
actors: Saori Hayami, Yumi Irino, Ai Kayano, Takahiro Sakurai
description: A group of friends were separated when one of them died in an accident. Later on she comes back as a ghost trying to get into heaven but to do that her friends must grant her a wish.

title: Silver Spoon (2014)
actors: Kento Nakajima, Alice Hirose, Tomohiro Ichikawa, Haru Kuroki
description: Yuugo, who grew up in the city, finds himself in an unfamiliar environment at Ooejo Agricultural High School, surrounded by nature and animals. Yuugo is also the only one who doesn't know what type of career he wants to pursue. He goes through struggles everyday, but he begins to grow as a person.

title: Love Live! The School Idol Movie (2015)
actors: Cristina Valenzuela, Erica Lindbeck, Kira Buckland, Erika Harlacher
description: The story of the film begins after the events of the second season, at the graduation ceremony of the third-year students. Knowing that the graduation of the third-year members means the end of u's, the nine girls take a walk around the school filled with memories. However, when the students attempt to leave the school gates, a single email is sent to them, and the curtain on a new story for u's begins.

title: Jon Stewart Has Left the Building (2015)
Black Butler: Book of the Atlantic (2017)
actors: Bryn Apprill, Dawn M. Bennett, Justin Briner, Jessica Cavanagh
description: A young lord and his demon butler board a luxury cruise ship to investigate claims of the dead being returned to life, and are faced with various complications.

title: No Game No Life: Zero (2017)
actors: Alexandra Bedford, Jessica Boone, Ricardo Contreras, Kregg Dailey
description: Adaption of the sixth Light Novel of series, it follows the story of two new characters, Riku and Schwi, during the events of the Great War prior to the Ten Covenants.

title: Flint (2017)
actors: Betsy Brandt, Queen Latifah, Marin Ireland, Kaelen Ohm
description: A woman deals with the toxic water scandal in Flint, Michigan, and the effect it has on her family.

title: Bungo Stray Dogs: Dead Apple (2018)
actors: Brian Beacock, Ray Chase, Lucien Dodge, Carrie Keranen
description: The Armed Detective Agency investigates a bizarre series of suicides involving an eerie mist.

title: Andrew Dice Clay: Dice Rules (1991)
actors: Andrew Dice Clay, Eddie Griffin, Sylvia Harman, Lee Lawrence
description: Outrageous, misogynistic and vulgar-to-the-max comedian Andrew Dice Clay does his stuff in this combination of a stand-up concert video, in a filled-to-capacity performance at Madison Square Gardens, and a series of comedy sketches.
